item.title: Building Validation Methodology for Technology Without Precedent
item.description: When you’re validating first-of-a-kind technology, there’s no standard to adapt and no prior art to borrow from. Here’s how to build a methodology from scratch without either paralysis or false confidence.

item.title: Test Infrastructure for First-of-a-Kind Energy Storage Technology
item.description: Designed and commissioned six test systems for a novel flow battery technology with no commercial precedent, delivering a $1.5M infrastructure investment on schedule and establishing validation methodologies from first principles.
